com.ikarus.solartaxi.celestialbodies

Class CelestialBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikarus.solartaxi.celestialbodies.CelestialBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Planet, Sun

    public abstract class CelestialBody
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a CelestialBody, either a 'Sun' or a 'Planet' object. Each object has a center point represented by x and y and a radius, as well as a Paint Object for the surface color and a value for the gravitational pull of the object.
    Author:
    Sebastian Kirchner

      • interpolate

        protected float interpolate(float rangeMin,
                float rangeMax)
        Get interpolated value in given range according to the size of the radius.
        Parameters:
        rangeMax - upper border of range
        rangeMin - lower border of range
        Returns:
        interpolated value in range according to radius

      • interpolateRGB

        protected int interpolateRGB(float minRGB,
                 float maxRGB)
        Get interpolated RGB value in given range according to the size of the radius. Allowed values for maxRGB and minRGB are [0, 255], invalid values will be set to 0 or 255.
        Parameters:
        maxRGB - the maxiumum RGB value (upper border)
        minRGB - the minimum RGB value (lower border)
        Returns:
        a value between minRGB and maxRGB
